name: StairGet
short_description:
When you're designing a ladder, you need to do some calculations so that you can make a comfortable one. 

This program will provide you that calculation by inputting the dimension of your stair room. The output of this program is a set of the 'antrede' and the 'optrede' of your stair.

This program also will allow you to look the preview from  three point of view - front, upside and left. 

Unfortunately I developed this program in Indonesian and I have not developed the English one yet. 

I develop this program with Visual Basic 6.0 so you need to install VBRun60.exe first. You can download it here :
http://support.microsoft.com/kb/192461
summary: A program that provide the calculation of your own stair
